divs: Sighting DetailsI'm not sure how to decribe what I saw it kinda looked like the moon but redish orange and the moon was on the other side of me . It reminded me of the sun setting the path of it that is but I had just watched the sun set 2 hours before. When I first starting watching it it had the shape of a cerset moon. I went inside to plung in my camra and when I came back out I couldn't see it. 1 min later my son went out and came right back in and said he could see it again. By the time I got out there it looked like a full cicle black on the inside and redish orange on the outer ring which kinda made me think I was watching an eclispe. I was able to get a few pics before my camra died while it looked like a creset moon but I wasn't able to get one of the full cicle before I couldn't see it any longer. I lost sight of it it looked like it went down like the sun does at sunset. I have a love for the moon and am often taking shots of the stars and moon but I haven't and clue what it was that I and my 13 year old son seen. It was like nothing I have ever seen before!
Summary: I'm not sure how to decribe what I saw it kinda looked like the moon but redish orange and the moon was on the other side of me . It reminded me of the sun setting the path of it that is but I had just watched the sun set 2 hours before.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Madison
There were no other sightings in Madison on or around May 12th 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
